mapper.sql: id, project_id, process_node_id, status, start_time, end_time, review_time, is_normal, current_progress_desc, additional_desc
mapper.insert: insert into pro_node (id, project_id, process_node_id, status, start_time, end_time, review_time, is_normal, current_progress_desc, additional_desc) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processNodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reviewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isNormal,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{currentProgressDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{additionalDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into pro_node
id,
project_id,
process_node_id,
status,
start_time,
end_time,
review_time,
is_normal,
current_progress_desc,
additional_desc,

mapper.update:
update pro_node
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
process_node_id = #{processNodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
review_time = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_normal = #{isNormal,jdbcType=CHAR},
current_progress_desc = #{currentProgressDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
additional_desc = #{additionalDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pro_node set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_node_id = #{processNodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, review_time = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_normal = #{isNormal,jdbcType=CHAR}, current_progress_desc = #{currentProgressDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, additional_desc = #{additionalDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pn.* ,pcn.id pcn_id,pcn.name pcn_name,pcn.flag pcn_flag from pro_node pn left join process_node pcn on pcn.id=pn.process_node_id where pcn.flag=1 and pn.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select pjn.* ,pcn.id pcn_id,pcn.name pcn_name,pcn.flag pcn_flag,pcn.end_type pcn_end_type,pcn.time_type pcn_time_type ,pcn.has_manPower pcn_has_manPower,pcn.has_fee pcn_has_fee,pcn.has_taskBook pcn_has_taskBook,pcn.has_checkBill pcn_has_checkBill,pcn.has_document pcn_has_document ,proj.id proj_id,proj.name proj_name,proj.flag proj_flag ,f.id fee_id, f.pro_node_id fee_pro_node_id, f.fee_template_id fee_fee_template_id,f.money fee_money, f.display fee_display ,ft.id fee_temp_id, ft.name fee_temp_name, ft.sort fee_temp_sort, ft.flag fee_temp_flag ,man.id man_id,man.core_man man_core_man ,mant.id man_temp_id,mant.project_team man_temp_project_team,mant.standard_model man_temp_standard_model,mant.sort man_temp_sort,mant.flag man_temp_flag ,task.id task_id,task.quota_num task_quota_num,task.quota_num_real task_quota_num_real ,taskt.id task_temp_id,taskt.quota_name task_temp_quota_name,taskt.quota_type task_temp_quota_type ,cb.id check_id,cb.isqualified check_isqualified,cb.check_item check_check_item,cb.remark check_remark ,cbt.id check_temp_id,cbt.check_item check_temp_check_item,cbt.check_item_property check_temp_check_item_property,cbt.remark check_temp_remark,cbt.isqualified check_temp_isqualified ,doc.id doc_id,doc.filename doc_filename,doc.author doc_author,doc.url doc_url,doc.upload_time doc_upload_time from pro_node pjn left join process_node pcn on pcn.id=pjn.process_node_id left join project proj on proj.id=pjn.project_id left join fee f on f.pro_node_id=pjn.id left join fee_template ft on ft.id=f.fee_template_id left join manpower man on man.pro_node_id=pjn.id left join manpower_template mant on mant.id=man.manpower_template_id left join task_book task on task.pro_node_id=pjn.id left join task_book_template taskt on taskt.id=task.task_book_template_id left join checkbill cb on cb.pro_node_id=pjn.id left join checkbill_template cbt on cbt.id=cb.checkbill_template_id left join document doc on doc.pro_node_id=pjn.id where pcn.flag=1 and pjn.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
